name: Micro:bit Black and White
description:
Update: the new stylesheet should work for new versions of MakeCode. Black text and strokes on white background for Microbit MakeCode. Perfect for exam paper setting.

Note: The style doesn't apply to "Downloading Screenshot". Workaround: make actual screenshots with a screenshot tool.
additional_info: Uncomment the last CSS property to get a pattern on disabled blocks. Only works for Firefox.
